author: forthommel
body:
This PR builds an extra `CTPPSLocalTrackLite` collection to include the diamond information up to the `miniAOD` output format.
Modifies the producer developed by @jan-kaspar and pushed to the `9_1_X` through #17701 to add this new collection:
* strips information can be retrieved using the `TrackingStrip` selector
* diamond detectors information can be retrieved using the `TimindDiamond` selector
title: CTPPS: diamond miniAOD
